template.name: tf_tpp
template.value:
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
import tensorflow as tf
flags = tf.app.flags FLAGS = flags.FLAGS flags.DEFINE_float('learning_rate', 0.01, 'Initial learning rate.') flags.DEFINE_integer('index', 1, 'Initial Index.') flags.DEFINE_string('train_dir', 'data', 'Directory to put the training data.') flags.DEFINE_boolean('fake_data', False, 'If true, uses fake data ' 'for unit testing.')
def main(argv=None): FLAGS.learning_rate FLAGS.train_dir FLAGS.fake_data FLAGS.learning
if __name__ == '__main__': tf.app.run()
